item.title: 沃克斯豪尔（Vauxhall）所有者 Stellantis 的一位高层管理人员警告说，在公司承诺将其卢顿工厂全部改造为电池动力车型之前，英国政府必须采取更多措施鼓励驾驶员改用电动汽车。
item.description:
The UK government must do more to encourage drivers to switch to electric vehicles, warns a top executive at Vauxhall owner Stellantis, before the company commits to fully converting its Luton plant to battery-powered models https://t.co/TAU6I4oZpt

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观点：@kanainagaki 写道：随着日本公司在本土市场以外寻求发展，更多的目标可能是在美国，在那里将与日益激烈的工会发生更多交锋。
item.description:

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 由保守派亿万富翁查尔斯-科赫（Charles Koch）支持的一个政治支出组织表示，在妮基-黑利周六在南卡罗来纳州初选中落败后，该组织将停止资助她的总统竞选活动。
item.description:
A political spending group backed by conservative billionaire Charles Koch said it would stop funding Nikki Haley’s presidential campaign, after she suffered a defeat in the South Carolina primary on Saturday https://t.co/YKrjoO0rLx

— Financial Times (@FT) February 27, 2024
